## FeatureGeometry type

Represents "geometry" property of "Feature" GeoJSON object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type FeatureGeometry = Point | MultiPoint | LineString | MultiLineString | Polygon | MultiPolygon;
```
